body:
Made a video of me PvPing in the latest Snapshot for 1.9 hope you enjoy, leave your opinions below of what you think of the fighting with cooldown and shields.

Spam clicking: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WNEbnK_7EO0&feature=youtu.be

Fishing Rod Nerf: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=twPLKUqiqnU&feature=youtu.be

replies.body:
I played the 1.9 snapshot and the shields are so OP, but I don't think I'm gonna like the update. Reasons: God Apple Is nerfed, hold 2 things at once, nerfed armour and enchantments and finally if u have full diamond armour and it has low durability it doesn't do as well as it did if it had full durability, 
Thank you for reading,
justneed_two

replies.body: Ok. I am really annoyed that Minecraft have screwed over their game. Their introducing that you can hold two things, castles in the end and shields. All these features are for mods. Previously in the past the 1.7 update was the best for me allowed PvPers to "block hit". Then roles around 1.8 introducing that you can't block hit, which isn't too bad. But now, now Minecraft have screwed them selves over with this dumb features. I really hope that Avicus NEVER goes to 1.9!!!

replies.body: From what I see. All this update needs is a little re balancing with the shields and it is perfect in my eyes. The meta will reset and new ways to adjust to pvp will form. I am very excited to see how this will change OCN (Avicus isn't on 1.8 yet so I am not expect much here)
